review: I had visited the hospital and it was neck pain related. Doctor was good in consulting me. Doctor was available and there was no waiting time in hospital. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. We knew doctor well. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Ointment was suggested. Massage was suggested. Within one week it was resolved. As we work for more time and sit because of that I had neck pain as I work in IT. Doctor told to relax and take break while working once in a while and he was friendly.

Very kind, friendly and easy to approach.. solved a angle problem for my dad which he was suffering for 4 years with 3 surgeries by different senior orthopedicians. Now my dad is able to walk with no bandages or dressings..  wry much thankful to him..

the consultation was for myself actually met the doctor in his clinic it was a very good experience he gave the right treatment for my problem he prescribed me some tablets & gel which really had good results I would surely recommend the doctor to others
Doctor identified the issue and recommend the best solution,. I would recommend the doctor for ortho issues
